name: Plot Castle
typedesc: Blueprints are used to place buildings on your personal plots in guilds to help you gain the new currency based on the actions of other players! They all start as level 1 and are upgradable from there.
desc: The first and required building for plots
fulldesc: The castle is the protector of your lemons. Contributions are made to the castle daily even if no player has used the server. As it gets upgraded the castle allows your other buildings to store more lemon revenue before reaching their limit.

levels.desc: Generates 20 lemons per day, allows you to place other buildings on plots in the same server.
Increases all buildings storage capacity by 10%, increases daily generation to 25
Increases all buildings storage capacity by 15%, increases daily generation to 30
Increases all buildings storage capacity by 20%, increases daily generation to 35
Increases all buildings storage capacity by 25%, increases daily generation to 40

name: Gacha Bank
fulldesc: The Gacha Bank stores lemons from when users run daily or claim cards.

levels.desc: Gives lemons when a user does daily
Gives lemons when a user claims cards or does daily

name: Tavern
desc: Gives lemons with achievements and quests

levels.desc: Gives lemons when someone completes an achievement in the guild
Gives lemons when someone completes a quest or achievement in the guild

name: Smithing Hub
desc: Gives lemons with forge, liq, draw
fulldesc: The smithing hub provides lemons when users run draw, liq, or forge. Payouts are determined based on building level

levels.desc: Gives lemons when people forge cards
Gives lemons when people forge or liquefy cards
Gives lemons when people forge, liquefy, or draw  cards

name: Auction House
fulldesc: Grants lemons for commands related to auctions

levels.desc: Gives lemons when someone successfully bids on an auction
Gives 2x lemons when someone successfully bids on an auction
Gives 3x lemons when someone successfully bids on an auction

name: Legendary Card Claim Ticket
typedesc: Claim tickets are used to claim cards of certain rarity or collection. They are usually awarded during events or for completing quests and collections
fulldesc: When used gives you legendary card. The collection is determined when awarded

name: Gift From Tohru
typedesc: Use Effect Card recipes to obtain usable or passive Effect Cards
fulldesc: When used gives you **Gift From Tohru** effect card. This is a passive item, so make sure you equip it into hero's effect card slot
